info.name: IntentionalStudy API - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for IntentionalStudy Bible App with all 90+ endpoints.

## Setup Instructions:
1. Import this collection into Postman or Thunder Client
2. Set the `baseUrl` variable to your API URL (default: http://localhost:5000/api)
3. Register a new user or login with existing credentials
4. Copy the JWT token from the login response
5. Set the `authToken` variable with your token
6. Start testing protected endpoints!

## Variables:
- `baseUrl`: API base URL
- `authToken`: JWT token from login
- `userId`: Current user ID
- `devotionalId`: Sample devotional ID
- `questId`: Sample quest ID

request.description: Register a new user account. Token is automatically saved to environment.
Login with email and password. Token is automatically saved.

{
  "title": "Finding Peace in Chaos",
  "content": "In times of uncertainty, God's word reminds us that He is always in control. When we face challenges, we can find peace in His promises. Let us remember that God works all things together for the good of those who love Him.",
  "verse": "Philippians 4:6-7",
  "verseText": "Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God. And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.",
  "date": "2024-12-18",
  "status": "published",
  "category": "Peace",
  "tags": ["peace", "anxiety", "prayer"]
}
